p: The antifungal activities of AW against the standard and clinical strains of Candida are shown in Table 2. The growth of the tested yeasts, including azole-resistant strains, was inhibited by the AW of T. ammi at a concentration of 0.125-0.25 V/V. Moreover, the AW of T. ammi exhibited fungicidal activity against the examined yeasts with the MFC value of 0.25-0.5 V/V.
